name: The Ritual (Samuel Wilson)
description:
This game is still heavily in the development stages but due to university has taken a major back seat.

The Ritual is a prototype created by 3 people. Its origin was to be a 4 person survival horror experience that evolves into a wave-based survival zombie game.

The game evolved to be a time-based zombie first-person shooter as the original scope was way outside of the bounds of us so we decided to make a playable arcade mode of zombies that has evolved to be the main game. The player is dropped on a road in the woods where they can explore the surrounding areas, seeing how long they can survive from the zombie onslaught.

Developers: Samuel Wilson, Daniel Foyle, Byron Andrew-Salvietto
